titleStmt.title: The passionate lover: or, The damsels grief crown'd with comforts. To a pleasant new play-house tune, much in request. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, I. Deacon, I. Blare, I. Back,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Sighs and groans, and melancholly moans ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
